items.sentence: I know that Tom and Mary have both spent time in prison.
I may not be able to sing tonight. I have a sore throat.
I met Tom for the first time three months ago in Boston.
When Tom leaves at night, he turns on the burglar alarm.
When Tom told Mary that he had done that, she got upset.
When Tom told Mary what he had done, she started crying.
When did you decide that doing that would be a bad idea?
Tom told the police I was the one who stole his bicycle.
Tom told the police that he had seen nothing suspicious.
Tom took Mary into his arms and kissed her passionately.
